mapper.insert: insert into injection_label (INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR, SCOPE, TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME) values (#{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightOperand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagRowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isShared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update injection_label set INJECTION_LABEL_CODE = #{injectionLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME = #{injectionLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC = #{injectionLabelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_TYPE = #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE = #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL_DATA_TYPE = #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHT_OPERAND = #{rightOperand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONDITION_TYPE = #{conditionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCOPE = #{scope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TAG_ROW_ID = #{tagRowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_SHARED = #{isShared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID,CLASS_NAME from injection_label where INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label
mapper.insert:
insert into injection_label (INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE,OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME) values
(#{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightOperand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{scope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagRowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isShared,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label where 1=1
and INJECTION_LABEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{labelName}),'%')

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label where INJECTION_LABEL_CODE = #{labelCode}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID,CLASS_NAME from injection_label where TAG_ROW_ID = #{tagRowId}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label
INJECTION_LABEL_ID not in
#{item}
and INJECTION_LABEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{labelName}),'%')

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId}
